# Settlement of ETH
This document presents the recommended steps in order to settle the Nahmii 1
balance of NII of account `0xE87d04a566B5e9e3abA89b3F50633218D80Acdb0`.

The ordered steps of contract function invocations are included below and in
the corresponding [steps.json](./steps.json). Please read [the general recipe
for settling Nahmii 1 balance](../../README.md) before starting on the first
step of settlement.

## Ordered steps
### Step 1
#### Contract
*DriipSettlementChallengeByPayment* ([0x906fd331f5e382f05b8ae26900140c37f0db139a](https://etherscan.io/address/0x906fd331f5e382f05b8ae26900140c37f0db139a))
#### Method name
*startChallengeFromPayment*
#### Method payload
```

```
#### Encode method args
* *payment*: 
```
{
  "seals": {
    "wallet": {
      "hash": "0x049a1c626ce7f26bf4c470a9474afa7cfca452b5ae82317a74ac3f73d124adc8",
      "signature": {
        "s": "0x022eadd0dbc71ddb9652458cf5726705a746b478502761dec731228188aea06d",
        "r": "0x2344c124e3634138e929e48cb89a65bb2ed6d0a11a89184cdf58be7836562640",
        "v": 27
      }
    },
    "operator": {
      "hash": "0xe5916b623f56cbe4fa19d77b3ba2ec16503d68a7229627717d158f85d9103f82",
      "signature": {

        "r": "0xf439f5bd382b9ec7d433be9ca505b1f241c80c461dbf1c312c4662edeccb9747",
        "v": 27

              "ct": "0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000",

### Step 2
#### Contract
*DriipSettlementByPayment* ([0xd2600fd59786b44c4869066018870aa33417f8f2](https://etherscan.io/address/0xd2600fd59786b44c4869066018870aa33417f8f2))
#### Method name
*settlePayment*
#### Method payload
```

```
#### Encode method args
* *payment*: 
```

### Step 3
#### Contract
*ClientFund* ([0xcc8d82f6ba952966e63001c7b320eef2ae729099](https://etherscan.io/address/0xcc8d82f6ba952966e63001c7b320eef2ae729099))

*withdraw*
#### Method payload
```

```
